Room.Name: The Widow Maker - Below Deck
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the Widow Maker pirate ship, below the main deck of the ship.
Room.LongDescription: Ahead to the north is the galley. You can smell the cook stiring up something delicious for dinner, but the continuous rocking of the ship under the main deck prevents you from enjoying that sensation. The hallway you are in continues to the south from here, past most of the crew cabins.
